website.title: Mrcomputer1's Post Count Progress Bar
website.howmanypostsdoyouhave: How many posts do you have on scratch?
website.howmanypostsdoyouhavehelp: Go to Discuss Scratch then go to the bottom then click Show your topics/posts click the POSTS link not TOPICS
website.previewbtn: Preview and Download image! After clicking wait for image then click again then press download
website.colorrequires: <b>Requires COLOR inputs - Use Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Opera - Safari and Microsoft Internet Explorer not supported
